abstract: Jeff Z. Klein and Christopher Botta of the Times discuss the Islanders' prospects for the 2011-12 season.
snippet: Jeff Z. Klein and Christopher Botta of the Times discuss the Islanders' prospects for the 2011-12 season.
lead_paragraph: In the first of three conversations previewing the coming seasons of the tri-state area's hockey teams, hockey writers Jeff Z. Klein and Christopher Botta discuss the chances of the Islanders qualifying for the Stanley Cup playoffs for the first time since 2007.

headline.main: 2-on-1: Do the Islanders Have the Defense and Goaltending to Make the Playoffs?
